body_html:
@sesamesub
Yes, it works for on CPUs correctly. My tf version is master branch and have applyed dc-asgd.patch
the patch is here:
https://github.com/zhuhyc/tensorflow/blob/dc-asgd/dc-asgd.patch
It looks like you don't apply the patch, please apply it and test again
